p: With regards to the effect of the type of composition on the physicochemical properties of the nanoformulation ( Figure 1, Table 4), Composition B with the highest lipophilicity (logP = 4.35, Table 2), surface tension (τ = 30.7 mN/m, Table 2), and viscosity coefficient (η = 150 mPa·s, Table 2) yielded a nanoemulsion with the largest droplet size and the highest PDI (for S:O = 0.5:0.5 and 0.4:0.6). In the case of other Compositions A, C, D, E, and F ( Table 4, Figure 1), no major differences were observed between the droplets of the inner phase.
